articles.author: Rebecca Falconer
articles.title: Musk says Trump has agreed to "shut" USAID down - Axios
articles.description: His comments follow reports that DOGE representatives visited USAID's D.C. HQ and accessed classified spaces and American citizens' data.
articles.content:
Elon Musk said President Trump has "agreed" to "shut" the U.S. Agency for International Development (USAID) down.
The big picture: Musk's comments early Monday followed reports that two senior USAID… [+2717 chars]
